alert.note: Alert for Lower Rio Grande Valley; San Agustin Plains and Adjacent Lowlands; South Central Highlands; South Central Mountains; Southwest Mountains; Upper Tularosa Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 23 at 11:12AM MST until February 23 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Lower Rio Grande Valley, San Agustin Plains and Adjacent Lowlands, South Central Highlands, Upper Tularosa Valley and Southwest Mountains. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 7 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Power and utility outages will be possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.

area.areaDesc: Lower Rio Grande Valley; San Agustin Plains and Adjacent Lowlands; South Central Highlands; South Central Mountains; Southwest Mountains; Upper Tularosa Valley
